Headers: Zuora CEO Says It's on the 'Right Side of History,' Despite COVID Pressures
Description: Zuora's third-quarter guidance failed to impress investors, but CEO Tien Tzuo says the company is on the right track despite economic turmoil.

Headers: 3 Potentially Explosive Stocks I Bought During the Recent Market Crash
Description: Small-cap stocks have historically outperformed large-caps in periods coming out of economic recessions, and the market's recent pullback is presenting opportunities to build position in young companies that could deliver life-changing returns if held for the long term.  With that in mind, I'm concentrating my investing right now on small-cap stocks that are trading well off their highs and are positioned to benefit from market-shaping trends.  Zuora is a company that provides a software platform that allows businesses to easily implement, automate, and analyze subscription-based business models.
